description: I specialized in Front-End and Back-End, Single-Page Application and Cloud-Based software.

I love being challenged. Working in different groups and people at Weatherford, I learnt how to adapt quickly. I have developed a well-rounded skillset through being involved in various projects. I am comfortable coding with JavaScript and Python.

about_me.question: Who am I?
answer: I am Ebrahim, a software developer with more than 6 years of experience in different roles in a service company.

about_me.question: What I am passionate about?
answer: To me, programming is ‚ÄúPursuit of Happiness‚Äù. Imagine you are working on a bug for hours. You are getting frustrated. You do not have any lead. You pour a coffee for yourself and watch an episode of Superstore. You come back and BOOM, you found it. As Will Smith said, ‚Äúthis moment is called happiness‚Äù and I chose to be a programmer because this moment worth all the frustrations.
I also love dancing and sport motorcycles. Jorge Lorenzo is my favorite rider.

about_me.question: About this website?
answer: This website was designed and built by me. For the Back-End, I have used Express and MongoDB and Front-End is designed using React. You can find the source code
if you like to know more. I am hosting this website using 10+ years old laptop sitting at the corner of my bedroom. So if it crashed while you are reading this, my apologies üòä.

about_me.question: What else?
answer: You may argue this but Golden Retrievers are the best dogs. Also, Kermit and Grover are my favorite puppets.
